author: Mykitchen101en Team
instructions:
Dry chicken
Dry cleaned boneless chicken whole legs with kitchen towels.
Pierce chicken whole legs with holes using a fork.
blend ingredients for marinade
Combine ingredients for marinade in blender, blend until fine.
marinate overnight
Pour marinade over chicken whole legs, coat each well with marinade. Keep refrigerated to marinate for at least 5 hours or overnight. (Reminder: Marinate longer for better taste.)
coat chicken with oil
Set aside marinated chicken at room temperature for 30 minutes before grilling. Transfer marinated chicken to a large pan (discard excess marinade), coat both sides with cooking oil.
coat wire rack with oil
Put wire rack into air fryer basket, coat with cooking oil.
Arrange chicken on wire rack
Arrange chicken whole legs on wire rack (skin-side down).
bake at 180°C for 10 minutes
Put into air fryer, bake at 180°C for 10 minutes.
turn over, bake at 180°C for 10 minutes
Turn the chicken whole legs over, bake again at 180°C for 10 minutes.
Bake at 200°C for 5 minutes
Bake at 200°C for another 5 minutes.
Cut into small pieces
Cut chicken chops into small pieces.

title: Grilled Lemongrass Chicken Chop With Air Fryer
